author: Rupjaz Rahman
text: You really need to train your drivers to be CONSIDERATE AND PERHAPS BE POLITE with Customers @Hermesparcels Just had a driver giving me attitude whilst he was on the wrong..I certainly will not be using your company in the future..Atrocious service @Hermesparcels @hermes

author: Rupjaz Rahman
text:
Bedroom window Can You confirm whether you'll finally deliver my document or shall I keep on waiting ?
@FedEx  @FedExHelp @FedExEurope @FedExForum

author: Rupjaz Rahman
text: Dear @FedEx I've been waiting for my delivery from TNT for a week now..its a very important document . How ever upon receiving text after text From @TNT and claiming they've attempted delivery etc etc..NOONE HAS ATTEMPTED ANYTHING , I'm still waiting ,looking out of my bedroom

text:

author: Rupjaz Rahman
text: As hard as this year has been, it’s been a major year of growth for me 🙏
